page.title: 13LIFE IN THE AREA
page.content: QUIETNESS OF THE COUNTRY AREA. ALTHOUGH THEY HAVE TO TRAVEL AN AVERAGE DISTANCE OF 4.1 KILOMETRES TO VISIT THEIR DOCTOR AND 5.6 KILOMETRES TO A DENTIST AND THE NEAREST SUPERMARKET IS 6 MILES AWAY, MOST PEOPLE WOULD NOT EXCHANGE THEIR RURAL EXISTENCE FOR THAT OF A TOWN. A WEEKLY VISIT TO AN OPEN MARKET AND A SUPERMARKET IS NORMAL FOR MOST FAMILIES AND IN SOME CASES THE MARKET OF THEIR CHOICE IS FORTY KILOMETRES AWAY. THE CHOICE OF PLACES TO VISIT IS INTERESTING TOO. MANY PREFERRING A FEW DAYS IN THE NORTH YORKSHIRE DALES TO A HOLIDAY BY THE SEA OR IN A TOWN. THERE HAVE INEVITABLY BEEN CHANGES IN THE AREA IN RECENT YEARS GONE ARE THE DAYS OF WEEKLY VISITS BY TRADESMEN WITH THEIR HORSES AND DRAYS ALTHOUGH SOME MOBILE SHOPS AND A LIBRARY ARE STILL TO BE SEEN. THE DAYS OF THE " FEAST"
